CustomField.description: The date at which the backups will be automatically deleted in layman text
CustomField.formula: 'After ' + TEXT(Delete_Backups_After__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Delete_Backups_Unit__c) + ' (at ' + LEFT(TEXT(Delete_Backups_Time__c), 5) + ') of Masking/Deletion Completion'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date at which the backups will be automatically deleted in layman text
CustomField.label: Backup Expiry Date
